pullrequest.title: Added coverage output files, added documentation upload script, fixed link in documentation

content.raw:
Same comment as in the analogous pull request for ign-transport.

Not 100% sure about the upload_doc.sh in the repository. Maybe it would better to create a hook on bitbucket that triggers a Jenkins job once a pull request is merged. The Jenkins job could compile the code and upload the doc automatically. In any case, this is infinitely better than what we have now, so I'm really happy to merge it. We can improve it in the future.
content.html:
Same comment as in the analogous pull request for ign-transport.

Not 100% sure about the upload_doc.sh in the repository. Maybe it would better to create a hook on bitbucket that triggers a Jenkins job once a pull request is merged. The Jenkins job could compile the code and upload the doc automatically. In any case, this is infinitely better than what we have now, so I'm really happy to merge it. We can improve it in the future.
